text: The Hawk's Trail is a 1919 lost American crime serial movie directed by first time director W. S. Van Dyke and starring King Baggot, Grace Darmond, Rhea Mitchell, Fred Windemere, Stanton Heck, George Siegmann. ==Other websites== * Category:1919 movies Category:1910s crime movies Category:American crime movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by W. S. Van Dyke
title: The Hawk's Trail
